verses.name: Luke 16:4
verses.text: I am resolved what to do, that, when I am put out of the stewardship, they may receive me into their houses.

verses.name: Luke 16:5
verses.text: So he called every one of his lord’s debtors unto him, and said unto the first, How much owest thou unto my lord?

verses.name: Luke 16:6
verses.text: And he said, An hundred measures of oil. And he said unto him, Take thy bill, and sit down quickly, and write fifty.

verses.name: Luke 16:7
verses.text: Then said he to another, And how much owest thou? And he said, An hundred measures of wheat. And he said unto him, Take thy bill, and write fourscore.
